plot outline: A girl befriends a guy through social media and falls in love with him. She travels to Chennai to be with him and quickly realizes the trap laid for her. This story revolves around social media exploitation and how a single girl faces it. Can she overcome this grave situation?
title: Karuthukalai Pathivu Sei
plot: A girl befriends a guy through social media and falls in love with him. She travels to Chennai to be with him and quickly realizes the trap laid for her. This story revolves around social media exploitation and how a single girl faces it. Can she overcome this grave situation?
